revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A Series of Letters, Discovering The Scheme projected by France, in M DCC LIX. For an intended invasion upon England with flat-bottom'd boats... by Oliver MacAlles..."
revision.text: Possibly: A Series of Letters, Discovering The Scheme projected by France, in M DCC LIX. For an intended invasion upon England with flat-bottom'd boats... by Oliver MacAllester. (London : Printed for the author; and sold by Mr. Williams, Fleet-Street...M DCC LXVII. [1767]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2432579~S1
